AssetRateAdjustment.name: AssetRateAdjustment
AssetRateAdjustment.description: Stores the tier rate adjustments for the asset rate card entries.

AssetRateCardEntryId.description: The ID of the parent asset rate card entry record associated with the asset rate adjustment.

LowerBound.description: The minimum quantity for the adjustment to be applicable.

Name.description: The name of the asset rate adjustment.

UpperBound.description: The maximum quantity for the adjustment to be applicable.
